definitions.definition: A short piece of text , often numbered, placed at the bottom of a printed page , that adds a comment , citation , reference etc, to a designated part of the main text.
examples: consult the footnotes for more details

definitions.definition: An event of lesser importance than some larger event to which it is related.
A qualification to the import of something.

main_definition: A short piece of text , often numbered, placed at the bottom of a printed page , that adds a comment , citation , reference etc, to a designated part of the main text.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) An event of lesser importance than some larger event to which it is related.
A qualification to the import of something.
